thread.section_title: Petstop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Petstop | petstop.ie
thread.title: Ms Shannon

author: Ms Shannon
title: Ms Shannon
text: Really happy with my recent purchases for my female lab got replacements of a new bed collar leash amongst other things all exceptional quality and fast delivery also purchased a bone shaped name tag which they engraved with my dogs name etc, it is honestly beyond expectations its fab I'm sure the engraving was for free too, will be purchasing from them again very soon to spoil her :)
